snippet: How are people in the Philippines recovering from Friday’s storm?
abstract: How are people in the Philippines recovering from Friday’s storm?
lead_paragraph: In “Devastation Feared Across Central Philippines in Typhoon’s Wake,” Keith Bradsher and Gerry Mullany write about Friday’s storm and its aftermath.

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | Typhoon Haiyan Devastates the Central Philippines
